thread.title: Just steps away from Times Square -
thread.title_full: Just steps away from Times Square - Review of Broadway at Times Square Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Toni x
title: Just steps away from Times Square -
text:
The hotel is a great location if you want to be at the heart of Manhattan. It's right near all the Broadway theaters, shopping, restaurants and bars. The hotel itself is clean, neat and the staff is more than accommodating. They also offer a voucher for the parking lot across the street for $26 for 24hrs if you choose just an overnight visit like we did. The rooms were a little small but clean.
I would recommend this hotel to anyone who is visiting New York city.
